verses.name: Job 12:18
verses.text: He looseth the bond of kings, and girdeth their loins with a girdle.

verses.name: Job 12:19
verses.text: He leadeth princes away spoiled, and overthroweth the mighty.

verses.name: Job 12:20
verses.text: He removeth away the speech of the trusty, and taketh away the understanding of the aged.

verses.name: Job 12:21
verses.text: He poureth contempt upon princes, and weakeneth the strength of the mighty.

verses.name: Job 12:22
verses.text: He discovereth deep things out of darkness, and bringeth out to light the shadow of death.

verses.name: Job 12:23
verses.text: He increaseth the nations, and destroyeth them: he enlargeth the nations, and straiteneth them again.
